procedural_fairness: CMHC intended to disclose the Record, notified Tridel
evidence_assessment: the evidence showed the Record was prepared for legitimate purposes, contained no confidential or harmful information
decision_reasoning: does not violate any statutory or Charter protections
application_details: Tridel argued that releasing the Record would cause financial harm, breach confidentiality, or violate constitutional rights
result_of_case: Court ruled in favor of CMHC, allowing the Record's release and dismissing Tridel's objections
claim_nature: Can the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation access information about Tridel Enterprises Ltd.
dispute_focus: release of a CMHC audit report
court_ruling: The application by Tridel Corporation to prevent disclosure of the Record was dismissed
reasonableness_of_decision: Record can be released as it does not violate any statutory or Charter protections
administrative_decision: CMHC intended to disclose the Record
